title: Right Wing Terrorist Caught After Attempting To Firebomb Business That Hosted Drag Event

media:group.media:title: Right Wing Terrorist Caught After Attempting To Firebomb Business That Hosted Drag Event
media:group.media:description:
A right-winger has been caught after he attempted to firebomb a donut shop for hosting a drag event. Ana Kasparian and Cenk Uygur discuss on The Young Turks. Watch TYT LIVE on weekdays 6-8 pm ET. http://youtube.com/theyoungturks/live

Read more HERE:  https://www.mediaite.com/tv/watch-man-firebombs-oklahoma-donut-shop-after-it-hosts-drag-queen-event/

"A man in Tulsa, Oklahoma threw a molotov cocktail through the window of a donut shop that had just reopened after it was vandalized following a drag show.

The Donut Hole in the city‚Äôs Brookside district posted on Facebook that someone had smashed windows out of the building on Oct. 16. The vandalism followed a drag show event the night before."*
